titleStmt.title: A proclamation, appointing a roup in the in-land excise of this kingdom, and of the rents and duties of Orknay and Zetland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Court of Exchequer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: At head: royal seal, with initials "I R".

Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
